releases.notes: No real changes, just demo for release tool.

name: Wolfenstein 3D Pain Face
description:
Show your level of pain with a Wolfenstein 3D inspired pain face.

 * Use W'bal, heart rate or power output for the pain source.
 * State of the art graphics (for 1992)
 * May induce feelings of nostalgia.
 * Mein Leben!!!

releases.notes:
version 1.6.7
- Points leaderboard and analysis now have an option for female only results
- When zoomed in, the Y-Axis minimum setting will now apply to the current view rather than the entire route
- added an option to control how much of the route is shown behind your pin when zoomed in
- added an option to display distance markers along the X-axis.  You can control what you want the increments to be or if it's set to 0, it will auto-scale based on the length of the route or zoomed section
- in the lap data window, clicking the "Auto lap power" field or pressing 'a' (if the window has focus) will toggle it on/off
- added options for the max elevation line to show your current altitude and the route maximum altitude when zoomed in. It will display as altitude / view max / route max (if view max and route max are the same, it only shows it once)
- general optimizations to remove unnecessary calculations when zoomed in

name: Zenmaster
description:
Arend's Mod Collection

* Fully customizable route elevation profiles
* See the active powerups in your group when the HUD is off
* Segment leaderboards
* Preview route and segment profiles
* Pace partner routes and current locations
* Lap data windows for workouts
* Leaderboards for points races

name: Costco Guys BOOM

releases.notes:
primetime release
* hobby project during recovery
* have fun!

description:
A Sauce Mod meme's included.
